name: Light of the Soul
description:
I created this work to reflect my own constant search for the meaning of ‘light’.

At times I feel overwhelmed with sadness,
it consumed me so much that there was a hole in my chest,
I felt so empty, I was drowning in darkness.
Sometimes I question whether I have ever found the meaning of life.
Yet the answer is still out of reach, shrouded in darkness…
But often the darkest night is where I see the brightest light,
the light in which hope shines from the darkness within.
And now, my heart is beating so fast that it shines brighter than before,
Enchanted I held the light,
and let the heart and the soul seek the light of life,
Because darkness will not - and will never - overcome the light.

This piece was inspired by the book “Light For The Lost Soul” by Mizz Nina where among other things she wrote quotes about the hardships of life especially through difficult times. Never forget that some of the best things in life are found when faced with hardship. 

| 2160 × 2880 [JPEG]
